Class Processor

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.component.SimulationComponent
microsim.simulation.component.processor.Processor
public class Processor extends SimulationComponent
A processor implementing the RISC-V rv32i ISA. This comprises basic memory movement, arithmetic and logic operations (except MULs and DIvs), and basic branching and stack management. For more info, see the @link green card.

  • Field Details

    • REGISTERS

      public static final int REGISTERS
      Number of registers. Fixed to 32 according to ABI.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • RESET_INSTRUCTION_ADDRESS

      private static final int RESET_INSTRUCTION_ADDRESS
      The reset value of program counter pc. This is set to EPROM_BEG from MemorySpace.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • pc

      int pc
      Program counter, separate from registers.

    • registers

      private int[] registers
      General registers. registers[0] is unused as it's the zero register. ABI specifies:
      Register ABI Name Description
      // zero Zero constant
      registers[1] ra Return address
      registers[2] sp Stack pointer
      registers[3] gp Global pointer
      registers[4] tp Thread pointer
      registers[5-7] t0-t2 Temporaries
      registers[8] s0 / fp Saved register / frame pointer
      registers[9] s1 Saved register
      registers[10-11] a0-a1 Function arguments / return values
      registers[12-17] a2-a7 Function arguments
      registers[18-27] s2-s11 Saved registers
      registers[28-31] t3-t6 Temporaries

    • bus

      final Bus bus
      Reference to the communication bus the component is mounted on.

    • temp

      int temp
      Temporary value used to keep bus operation results in-between microops.

    • byteSelect

      Bus.ByteSelect byteSelect
      Temporary indicator of read/write byteSelect.

    • opQueue

      Deque<MicroOp> opQueue
      Queue of microops to execute, basically acts as a pipeline.

  • Constructor Details

    • Processor

      public Processor(Bus bus)
      Instantiates processor, taking a reference to the bus it's mounted on. Resets instruction pointer to RESET_INSTRUCTION_ADDRESS.
      Parameters:
      bus - bus the component is mounted on

      int getRegister(int i)

      val - value to set register to

    • fetchDecode

      private void fetchDecode()
      Sets processor up for a fetch execute cycle, called when microop queue is empty.

    • step

      public void step()
      Steps by fetching the next microop and executing it, or filling the queue with fetchDecode() if it's empty
